message: Let's start fair. I take the bigger share, but I'm willing to negotiate.
That's not fair, Alice! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor. We still have time to work this out, but we need to move faster.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm coming down to 48/52 - that's very generous.  Let's end this before the money shrinks even more!
